snippet: Legal arms sales by Belgium became a troubling factor in the Libyan conflict over the past year. Now that the revolution is over, there are concerns about where those weapons may turn up next.
abstract: Legal arms sales by Belgium became a troubling factor in the Libyan conflict over the past year. Now that the revolution is over, there are concerns about where those weapons may turn up next.

headline.main: Profit and Proliferation, Part 2: Will Belgian Arms End Up in Syria?
